website_summaries.verdict: With an oversized solid steel axle, this platform can handle a serious workout and a serious amount of weight.
pros: Fits all standard and Olympic bars
Designed with an oversized solid steel axle
Pivot point with dual bronze oil-lite bushings that lock to any 2-inch tubing or bolted to the floor
cons: Does not fit the Body Solid weight rack
Be sure to slide the bar all the way in
If you don't, the bar can slide out when you're done and damage your floor

customer_reviews.title: Never knew anything like this existed until I saw one being used in ...
customer_reviews.text: Never knew anything like this existed until I saw one being used in a YouTube video. What an incredibly-handy piece of equipment to add to your workout routine! It secures surprisingly well to most home benches, and its heavy-weight construction holds up to punishing use. Depending on the workout, Ive had as much as 180 lbs in plates (225 lbs with bar) in it with no issues. Two quick words of warning - make sure to check the tensioner knob after each workout, and make sure sure to slide the barbell all the way in after each set. I failed to do so early on, and dinged my floor pretty bad when the weight pulled out.
customer_reviews.author: Kanazozo

customer_reviews.title: Overall a Great Piece of Equipment at a Reasonable Price
customer_reviews.text: This is a well-made piece of equipment, but I'm puzzled as to why the manufacturer didn't make a mechanism to hold onto the bar itself. I solved this issue by wrapping a piece of thin bubble wrap around the end of the bar and turning it as I pushed the bar into the holder. This way the bar doesn't rattle at all and it wont easily come out of the cup-type holder. I wouldn't want to drill into the floor where the device is currently being used so I bolted it to a piece of plywood about one foot by three foot and placed plate weights on the left and right side of the bar-holder.
customer_reviews.author: Memento Mori

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to my home gym
customer_reviews.text: Been wanting one of these for a while, decided to get it to expand workouts I'm capable of performing. Love the 360° rotation, and it has 1" & 2" bar option. Deducted 1 star because the mounting bracket it came with is pretty useless, so I made my own. Just make sure you mount it to something with weight on it or is solid.
customer_reviews.author: Eroc and the roc pile

customer_reviews.title: Does not fit body solid rack
customer_reviews.text: Solidly built piece of equipment. That said it does not fit on the body solid rack. Very odd. In fact the flat part that anchors it down isn't wide enough to accept most workout equipment tubing. The only piece of equipment I have narrow enough to attach it to is a preacher curl bench. Now I have to decide whether to either attach it to that or bolt it down to the ground.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: It also does great with rows
customer_reviews.text: This was a solid addition to my power rack in my garage. Once I bolted it down I was able to use it for standing barbell twists which is what I was mainly hoping to use it for. It also does great with rows. Definitely a worthy addition to any gym.
customer_reviews.author: cfitz

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PLATFORM
customer_reviews.text: I am older and can no longer body build so I use this in reverse: I face toward the bar and platform instead of over the bar and I lift the bar up in front of me and push it up with my arms and it gives a good compound exercise that uses all of my body. This platform is great because it not only holds the bar solidly in place but because it swivels I leave the bar and weights in it 24/7 and just roll it out of the way when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: housewifeman

customer_reviews.title: It works as intended.
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product twice a week for 22 months. Usually 12 to 18 set totaling 360 to 480 repetition on a day with max weight of 90 lbs. It works very well. It does get squeaky and a shot of penetrating lubricant works great. I highly recommend this product for cross fit endurance type work outs. Hope it last another 22 months.
customer_reviews.author: Neal Verzosa

customer_reviews.title: In short, product is NOT as described; very POOR customer support/service
customer_reviews.text: The model I received is different than the image above - however, the description stated "locking feature"... no there is no such feature on my model. Furthermore, I contacted the company asking a simple question regarding the acquisition of additional bolts (hardware) since they only supply one, which is only sufficient for std 2 or 2 1/2" clamp mount, and aside from the automated response I have yet to hear back.
customer_reviews.author: sweebot

customer_reviews.title: A must have if you get the bar
customer_reviews.text: Although this one does not show it, I bought the platform with the smaller tubing attached to the top side of the larger olympic tubing. I have both bars, so I can interchange if I want to. I mainly use the standard fitting though. This fits nicely under my lat pull down machine, and does not move. At first I thought about doing with out it and just using the corner in my 'cage' unit, but the thought of scratching it, and not having a smooth pull led me to the decision to purchase this. I use this and the bar set-up a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry B.

customer_reviews.title: Great Alternative To Knocking A Hole In A Corner Of Your Gym
customer_reviews.text: This is an ingenious little device for holding an Olympic bar. I remember back in the day, which was a Tuesday by the way, when it was customary to knock a hole in one of the corners of your gym to fit one ends of an Olympic bar for t-bar rows. This was before they had juice bars and nail parlors in the gyms.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: What a great addition to my home gym
customer_reviews.text: What a great addition to my home gym; I've wanted one of these for a while. Works exactly like I hoped it would. Secures well to my 2 inch squat rack frame. Doesn't budge when doing overhead presses or rows. Movement is very smooth. Heavy duty construction. The best part is, it takes up hardly any space in my home gym. I would definitely recommend this to friends (and have already!).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Mounted easily to my body solid power rack! Works perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This mounted easily to my body solid power rack and works great. It doesn't take up much space or get in the way at all. My Olympic barbell fits perfectly and this has allowed me to add a ton of new exercises to my workout regimine.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Ward

customer_reviews.title: Great piece for a great price
customer_reviews.text: Great piece for a great price. I attached it right to my power cage and enjoy the limitless variety of exercises that it allows me to do. I recently purchased another one and now have the option of doing double landmine exercises.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald McDermott

customer_reviews.title: easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Save your walls and buy one of these. Handles both olympic and 1" bars. Smooth, easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: James C. Karger

customer_reviews.title: Excellent piece of hardware
customer_reviews.text: if you want to build mass - you will need this. everything from one handed shoulder press to bent over rows, this will add mass by letting you go heavy. One handed lat rows to tbar rows. you can build a massive back with this WITHOUT spending a fortune. I would buy again in a heartbeat.
customer_reviews.author: vanhalenHC

customer_reviews.title: This product is awesome. It works a whole lot better than your ...
customer_reviews.text: This product is awesome. It works a whole lot better than your buddy standing on the back of the bar to hold it in place. Very sturdy and will get much use out of this. Fast shipping. Very satisfied
customer_reviews.author: customer

customer_reviews.title: good quailty, only thing I wish was it didnt ...
customer_reviews.text: good quailty, only thing I wish was it didnt have the attachment piect on the back of the holder. But it works great. thanks
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Smith

customer_reviews.title: works awesome
customer_reviews.text: T bar machines are too counterbalanced for me, this thing is great. Fits in my body solid rack perfectly. I stuck it in the far corner of the rack so it doesn't interfere with the bench when I bring it in there. It swivels nicely so it doesn't matter where you stand or where the bar faces.
customer_reviews.author: buyingsomuchfood

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for back day workouts!
customer_reviews.text: This is a must have for all gym enthusiasts. A perfect complement to my back day workouts; I love how easy this bar is to load and lift!
customer_reviews.author: Heather Schnitz

customer_reviews.title: good equipment
customer_reviews.text: good piece of equipment i like the fact that it is adjustable needs to be placed under a sturdy piece of heavy exercise equipment or can be bolted into ground several power movements can be performed with this piece of equipment.
customer_reviews.author: gary s.

customer_reviews.title: Main bolt shears after 3 months
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased this twice for our gym. Both times it has sheared off the bolt within 3 months of use. The first time we just hoped it was a bad bolt but after the second time we knew it was the quality. We cannot return it or get it replaced and Body Solid ignores our emails about trying to get a replacement from them. Unless your use is going to be really light I would stay away from it.
customer_reviews.author: Jeromy Goodson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great. I've attached it to the corner of my power rack and it is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Tinder

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t fit the Body Solid rack
customer_reviews.text: Would have been a good buy if it actually fit the body solid rack that I have. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Seth Harding

customer_reviews.title: TBR-10- T-Bar Row Platform
customer_reviews.text: Great for T-Bar Rows! It really is a decent platform for training the back and shoulders. I would recommend it to anyone who would be interested.
customer_reviews.author: Breezy7

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Amazing. Very well built. Good weight to it. It's a win for sure.
customer_reviews.author: j rhea

customer_reviews.title: heavy duty with different secure points.
customer_reviews.text: Great. It arrived quickly. Got it set up at the base of my machine and as soon as my bar arrives I will beat my back muscles up.
customer_reviews.author: Trace Y. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: It does its job
customer_reviews.text: Shipping was fast, I live in Hawaii, I was kinda disappointed in the fact that nothing to lock the Olympic bar down, other than that, it works great. I would recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Fred Asuncion

customer_reviews.title: Works well.
customer_reviews.text: Works good. Had to tighten bolts when I received it. No biggie.
customer_reviews.author: beef76

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, easy to install, works extremely well!
customer_reviews.text: This product is exactly as advertised. Good quality, easy to install, and works extremely well. Grappler's press, bent over rows, bus-driver rotations, etc... Have fun!
customer_reviews.author: J. Rappl

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Not much to say on this. It's a basic / mechanical device, but it's really well made and performs exactly as advertised. It's been a great addition to my gym and I use it all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Dave B

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This T-bar row platform works great. I anchored it to my basement floor and welded my own T-bar handle for my Olympic bar. I use an extra car stand for bar rest so it's easier to load and unload weight plates. I would buy again and again.
customer_reviews.author: Rocks!

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: This piece is a great product because there are several exercises that can be performed. I don't know why I didn't get this sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Cotey

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty and better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty and better than expected. Simple and excellent product. The swivel feature is also important depending on the other bench equipment that you have. I believe I also made a less positive feedback post in error mistaking it for another related product.
customer_reviews.author: Eugene G Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Body- Solid Full- Swivel Locking T- Bar Row Platform
customer_reviews.text: The device met all my expectations, it's very sturdy, take up little to no space. It allows me to perform my exercise with ease. I'll recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Choonks

customer_reviews.title: AS EXPECTED !
customer_reviews.text: REALLY AWESOME, PROVIDES THE BEST WORKOUT POSSIBLE IF YOU HAVE THE RIGHT EQUIPMENT FOR IT. LOVED THE BUY, FAST, EASY NO COMPLICATIONS
customer_reviews.author: GamerChick83

customer_reviews.title: Nice addition to my garage gym
customer_reviews.text: Nice addition to my garage gym. Doing t-bar rows and land mines has never been easier. Mounted it to my weight tree rather than my power rack to keep it out of the way more. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Ralph H.

customer_reviews.title: Landmine Versatility
customer_reviews.text: So many things you can do with the landmine. Simple, great addition to any home gym. Lots of bang for the buck with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Steven L. Eklund

customer_reviews.title: Much Better than a corner
customer_reviews.text: This product works as it should and is much better than sticking a bar in a corner. The one thing it lacks is a set screw to retain the bar, but under most usage this is not an issue.
customer_reviews.author: 4estGimp

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: What can I say? It's a recognized brand and great quality. The price is good here as well. I've never had a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Team Geofrog

customer_reviews.title: Must have for a home gym
customer_reviews.text: Great piece of equipment it adds so many functional exercises to what you can do. Really don't see how there are more in gyms.
customer_reviews.author: Alan J. Parent

customer_reviews.title: Better than the Other Thaang!
customer_reviews.text: Folks this does work very similar to the Landmine. You have to find a way to anchor or bolt onto a heavy base, yes it may take a little resourcefulness. But worth the savings to me......again not knocking the other product, its has the two way swivel so the movements are only limited by your imagination!
customer_reviews.author: GT Gangte

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome. Now I have a legal landmine. Time for explosive workouts.
customer_reviews.author: K. Clark

customer_reviews.title: Body Solid TBR10 T-Bar Row Platform
customer_reviews.text: This item is built like a tank. It is a very helpful addition to my workout, without having to buy a machine that will need a lot of space to set-up. This item works in tandem with the lat blaster handle bar and of course, your olypic or standard size bar. It would have been helpful to know that you can only perform the bent row exercise comfortably if you are using 35 pound weight plates. You can use 45 pound weight plates but the range of motion will be limited due to the size of the plate. Overall, this product is well worth the money and very useful for people with very limited workout space.
customer_reviews.author: Stetchkov

customer_reviews.title: Also good for the Grappler Press
customer_reviews.text: This is a sturdy, well-made platform that is made of thick steel. Body Solid excels at making commercial-grade equipment and selling it at residential prices. If you buy two of these, it does the same thing as The Grappler, a device made by Westside Barbell that sells for $300. And it's great for T-bar rows, too. I attached mine to my homemade squat rack, and it holds just fine. One drawback, however. Body Solid should have made this platform so it can go under 3" tubing. I could have attached it to my Smith machine and it would have worked out much better.
customer_reviews.author: S. Reece

customer_reviews.title: ROWS
customer_reviews.text: GREAT PRICE QUICK AND EASY PURCHASE. I WOULD PURCHASE IN FUTURE FROM THIS PARTICULAR RETAILER !!!!!!!!!!!! NO HASSLES ,GREAT REPUTATION
customer_reviews.author: Joaquin I. Heng

customer_reviews.title: A very good device for the job.
customer_reviews.text: It works as expected, very good. Improves the position and the work of muscles. You can get a better workout and less possibilities to harm yourself.
customer_reviews.author: Ruben Toscano

customer_reviews.title: Lift Heavy
customer_reviews.text: This T-bar Row swivel is useful in home gyms to allow you to do a variety of single-ended barbell work. The thumb-screw is a bit wobbly, but once I got it secured, it is stable. The pivot took me a while to get working. The trick is to make sure the bolt in the base of the pivot is tight enough. From the factory, mine was very loose. After you get the basic Row working with the single-ended barbell cradled by either a V-bar or T-bar, check out the Bus Driver Rotation, Drop Squat and Row, or Barbell Squat and One Arm Press.
customer_reviews.author: S. Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Shipping seemed a bit excessive but the item works great and looks like it will hold up well!
customer_reviews.author: rj

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.text: This piece of equipment meets all my needs in doing T-Bar rowing. It is mobile in that I can move it in my gym under any bench or rack that supports the weight used to do the exercise. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck Berrier

customer_reviews.title: Great piece of "equipment"
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the Body Solid TBR10 T-Bar Row Platform for the gym in my personal training school (School of Exercise, Training & Science). It's the perfect piece of equipment! It takes up very little room and we can switch the bar back and forth from the bench press to the T-bar row. The Students and clients love it!
customer_reviews.author: Doc D

customer_reviews.title: Great for T bar rows
customer_reviews.text: Great for T bar rows, like that the base pivots to give a better range of motion. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas P.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Well made, and lets me do a lot more in my home gym area. It takes little space yet is durable and well made.
customer_reviews.author: Carl M Roehm

customer_reviews.title: "T-Bar Row Platform"
customer_reviews.text: Overall, this is a good product for the money. It has to be achored to the floor of course, using a red head drop in anchor and bolt in concrete works best, larger diameter deck/lag screws in wood flooring. The unit moves not just vertically, but swivels horizontally, which makes it a little more versatile then the description indicates. The unit can be used for T-Bar Rows, but it can be used for landmines and similar exercies as well. It's all set up to accept both diameter bars.
customer_reviews.author: CSTMech

customer_reviews.title: this equipment is highly recommended.
customer_reviews.text: I've used this routinely going on 4 years, so far, no problems. I anchored it to a 45lb weight that I bought from a local pawn shop for $20. It doesn't slide at all when placed on a rubber mat. Overall, this equipment is highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Hudson

customer_reviews.title: Great add-on for home gym
customer_reviews.text: Excellent piece of equipment. Great addition to my home gym and leaves a small footprint.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This product is very durable, great price, allow me to do T-bars without having to buy a t bar machine
customer_reviews.author: Damian

customer_reviews.title: Base does not securely attach to power rack using the ...
customer_reviews.text: Base does not securely attach to power rack using the theaded pinch bolt. Average to below average quality. Should have bought the one from Rogue.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Harvey

customer_reviews.title: Body-Solid TBR-10
customer_reviews.text: Great apparatus! I have no problems whatever using this with a standard bar. Rowing with this is excellent! I have it attached to my dumbell rack. Solid as a rock.
customer_reviews.author: Heritage Review

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I gave this only two stars. It seems pretty heavy duty and like a well-made product, but I called a fitness place that sells Body Solid products to ask them about this and if it fit the GPR-378 Body Solid Power Rack, and they said it did, so I ordered it. Well, it does not fit, so I will either have to bolt it to the floor or send it back. Just disappointed and don't understand why it would not be made adjustable to ensure it fits power racks better, which was the whole idea of buying this in the first place. Don't get it.
customer_reviews.author: Natsha

customer_reviews.title: awesome just hope it lasts
customer_reviews.text: sticker says "designed in USA. quality built in China". everything seems to work well for now but as we know all chinese junk never lasts. this piece of equipment can be used for many different exercises so if it lasts 4 years. Ill buy another one at that point. so far i am happy.
customer_reviews.author: C. J. S.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I only had an issue with UPS. However, I haven't seen any issues with this so far.
customer_reviews.author: Drexel

customer_reviews.title: You don't need this just place your straight bar in ...
customer_reviews.text: You don't need this just place your straight bar in a corner of your room over some barrier (old towel or pillow) between it and the wall. Does the same thing. Save your money.
customer_reviews.author: malcolm harris

customer_reviews.title: Don't judge a book by it's cover
customer_reviews.text: I have a typical 7' olympic bar that I bought from a sporting goods store and it does not fit into this product. The big end will go in but not the small end. The diameter of the smaller end of this "locking t-bar" is apx. 1/16th to 1/8th of an inch short on it's diameter so the bar won't fit! Besides that, it doesn't have any means of locking your bar into this device. Only the device itself has one hand-screw-knob so you can tighten it to somewhere else. But it doesn't lock your bar into it!
customer_reviews.author: Dylan T. Hedrick

product_meta.title: Body-Solid TBR10 T bar Row Platform,Black
product_meta.description: Body-Solid TBR10 T-bar Row Platform fits all Standard and Olympic bars. Simply put one end of the bar in the platform cup and load up the other end with all the weight you can handle. The T-Bar Platform features an oversized solid steel axle pivot point with dual bronze Oil-Lite bushings that lock rock-solid to any 2" tubing, or it can be bolted to the floor. Full 360° swivel-ability makes it a dream come true in tight workout quarters. Built for a lifetime of heavy-duty back-blasting workouts! Patent Pending. Cannot be used independently.
feature_bullets: Lat Blaster bar #Lbb28, Olympic bar, and weights optional
Fits all standard and Olympic bars
Simply put one end of the bar in the platform cup and load up the other end with all the weight you can handle
